statements: DELETE FROM customer_accounts WHERE id = 100 AND last_transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance < 0 OR full_name LIKE 'John%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 AND transaction_date > '2021-05-01'
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101 AND name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND type = 'withdrawal';
